articles.title: DeWalt's 'Powerful' but 'Quiet' Shop Vac With 'Seriously Impressive' Suction Power Is Over 30% Off on Amazon
articles.author: Cameron Le Blanc
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a discounted price on the DeWalt 5-Gallon Stealthsonic Shop Vacuum, reducing it from $200 to $133. The vacuum has received positive reviews for its quiet operation, powerful suction, and included accessories, making it suitable for both shop and home use. It is available with a suite of accessories.

articles.title: Dreame-ing of a Cleaner Tomorrow
articles.author: Partner Content
articles.summary: Dreame, a smart home appliance company, is opening a flagship store in San Diego at Westfield UTC on April 26. The store will showcase Dreame's smart home cleaning solutions, including the X50 Ultra Robot Vacuum, H12 Pro FlexReach, and Z20 Station Cordless Stick Vacuum.

articles.title: Unconventional NYC street ad invites people to scratch-and-sniff giant armpits
articles.author: Kelly Corbett
articles.summary: Billie, a female body care brand, launched a new tropical-inspired scent called Coco Villa, which contains notes of spiced vanilla, coconut cream, and sunny sandalwood. The company has introduced scratch-and-sniff ads in New York City to promote the new product. The ads are slated to be up until May 16.

articles.title: Enjoy 16 hours of battery life with this great everyday laptop, now under $200
articles.author: Boing Boing'S Shop
articles.summary: The Microsoft Surface SE laptop is on sale for $189.99, which is 49% off its regular price. This laptop features an Intel Celeron processor, an 11.6-inch display, 8GB RAM, 128GB SSD and a 16-hour battery life, and it runs on Windows 11 SE.

articles.title: The New 'Trump 2028' Hat Isn't Just Ugly, It's a Headgear Harbinger
articles.summary: The Trump Store has launched a new variation of the MAGA hat.  The design is based on X content. The store also offers a Star Trek

articles.title: Yatsen CEO on Science-Backed Beauty, Turnaround Strategy, and Global Positioning  Apr. 25, 2025 19:51
articles.summary: Yatsen Holding Ltd. is focusing on science-backed innovation, having invested over $80 million in R&D. This includes the launch of the Biolip Essence Lipstick, a hybrid product combining makeup and skincare. Yatsen is also exploring neuroscience applications within the skincare domain.

articles.title: A new store for DREAME products opens in Ayalon Mall
articles.summary: Cristalino Group, Dreame's distributor in Israel, is launching a new Dreame concept store at Ayalon Mall in Ramat Gan. The store introduces a new service offering free home delivery within 4 hours. This launch aims to expand Dreame's retail presence in Israel.

articles.title: Nike Makes Major Announcement for Sneaker Releases
articles.author: Tim Ryan
articles.summary: Nike is introducing "SNKRS Link," a new feature within the SNKRS app, to combat bots during coveted sneaker releases. This service aims to bypass the traditional purchase process by providing links or QR codes through creative influencers, directing customers to instructions for purchasing the shoes. The goal is to get sneakers into the hands of actual customers rather than bots.

articles.title: Here's How Nike's New SNKRS Link Experience Works
articles.summary: Nike is launching SNKRS Link, a new release experience within its SNKRS app. This new service aims to give fans a better chance to purchase coveted shoes through special links shared by Nike or its partners on various platforms. The products will only be available for a limited time, and sizing and availability are not guaranteed.

articles.title: We tried nearly 60 cleaning products last month — here's what we'd buy again
articles.summary: Yahoo's housewares testers reviewed new cleaning products, including new countertop sprays, detergents, scrubbers, and gadgets. Windex has recently launched cool new products. Bissell released the Little Green Mini.

articles.title: Justin Bieber Turns Heads With Announcement
articles.author: Kevin Harrish
articles.summary: Justin Bieber announced the launch of his new brand, Skylrk, in partnership with his wife, Hailey. The initial product line will feature a diverse range of items, including sweatshirts, shoes (sneaker-style, slip-on, and slipper-style), sunglasses (wide-framed and wire-framed), a phone case, a handbag, and beanie-style hats. The launch date is currently unknown, but the website displays the company logo.

articles.title: New Bath & Body Works opens in Dayville: Why the company is still using a physical store
articles.author: Connor Linskey
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works opened a new store in Dayville featuring the updated Gingham+ store design. The Gingham+ design includes a new layout for improved navigation, dedicated product zones, scent bars for testing fragrances, and design elements aimed at attracting Generation Z customers with a softer color palette and a more relaxing in-store experience.

articles.title: How the Infinix NOTE 50 is redefining affordable flagship performance
articles.author: Kemi Filani
articles.summary: Infinix is introducing the NOTE 50, a new smartphone designed to provide a premium experience without a high price tag. It is being positioned as an affordable flagship device.

articles.title: 5 Creative Ways To Monetize ChatGPT's New Image Feature
articles.author: Tobi Opeyemi Amure
articles.summary: ChatGPT has released its image generation tool, opening up new possibilities for creating visual content faster and more affordably. This new feature empowers users to offer creative services like product image creation, marketing visuals, and visual testing services without the need for extensive equipment or expertise. Small sellers and marketing teams can now access polished, on-brand visuals and visual A/B testing through services leveraging ChatGPT's new capabilities.

articles.title: Deal of the Day: Amazon Kindle Colorsoft is 20% off right now
articles.author: Harry Rabinowitz
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the Kindle Colorsoft, their first full-color e-reader. The Kindle Colorsoft features a color display that allows users to enjoy comic books and highlighted notes in a full range of colors. It retains features from other Kindle devices like adjustable screen brightness, 32GB storage, IPX8 waterproofing, and weeks-long battery life.

articles.title: Best Weed Pens: Top 5 THC Vape Pens for a Powerful High
articles.summary: The article highlights several new THC and CBD vape pens, including the Diet Smoke Blue Dream Disposable Vape, Secret Nature CBD Disposable Vape, Elevate Sativa Vape, Exhale Wellness Liquid Diamond Disposable Vape, and Budpop Delta 8 Disposable Vape. These products vary in cannabinoid content, flavor profiles, and intended use, offering consumers a range of options for a convenient and controlled cannabis experience. Each product boasts unique features such as natural ingredients, third-party lab testing, and ease of use, appealing to both experienced users and first-timers.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers race to store as three-tier airer scanning for less than £2 is spotted & it'll dry your laundry in no time
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Aldi is offering the Addis 3 Tier Concertina Airer as a Specialbuy for a discounted price of £1.99. The airer, praised for its sturdiness and spaciousness, features multiple tiers and a 16m drying space, making it an efficient laundry solution.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers race to store as three-tier airer scanning for less than £2 is spotted & it'll dry your laundry in no time
articles.author: Senior Digital Writer
articles.summary: Aldi is offering the Addis 3 Tier Concertina Airer at a discounted price of £1.99. The airer, normally priced at £14.99, has received positive reviews online, with customers praising its sturdiness and spaciousness. The Addis 3 Tier Concertina Airer boasts a drying space of approximately 16m and has a weight capacity of around 15kg.

articles.title: Baidu Launches ERNIE 4.5 Turbo, ERNIE X1 Turbo and New Suite of AI Tools to Empower Developers and Supercharge AI Innovation
articles.author: Baidu
articles.summary: Baidu launched ERNIE 4.5 Turbo and ERNIE X1 Turbo AI models, emphasizing multimodal capabilities, reasoning, and cost-effectiveness. Alongside these models, Baidu unveiled Xinxiang, a multi-agent collaboration app, and announced an AI Open Initiative to enhance developer access to Baidu's services.

articles.title: Frurt to open new High Wycombe store at Queens Square in May
articles.author: Audience
articles.summary: Frurt is opening a new frozen yoghurt store in High Wycombe on May 17. The new store launch will feature a grand opening event with 50% off all menu items between 12pm and 3pm on May 17 and 18.

articles.title: Salsa maker is resurrecting father's recipes from 1960s-era Modesto restaurant
articles.author: The Modesto Bee
articles.summary: Senor Campos Salsa will be sold in stores for the first time with Friday's launch. This marks the introduction of Senor Campos Salsa as a product available for retail purchase.

articles.title: Find Your Perfect Mattress for Sweet Dreams at Bensons for Beds
articles.author: Ameyaw Debrah
articles.summary: Bensons for Beds offers a wide range of mattresses, including pocket sprung, memory foam, hybrid, and latex options, to cater to different sleep preferences and needs. These mattresses provide tailored support, pressure relief, and motion isolation, ensuring optimal comfort and a restful night's sleep. With over 60 years of experience, Bensons for Beds helps customers find the perfect mattress for their needs.

articles.title: Lush fans 'traumatised' over design of new bath bomb featuring iconic character
articles.author: Alan Johnson
articles.summary: Lush has launched a new E.T.-themed bath bomb as part of their 30th-anniversary collection, celebrating World Bath Bomb Day. Priced at £9.50, the bath bomb is available in stores and online and is scented with lemon and bergamot. The fresh collection made its debut on the Lush App on April 22 and hit stores globally, as well as online, on April 24.

articles.title: Dreams and Sofatime opens new flagship store in Crescent Link Retail Park in Derry
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: Dreams and Sofatime have launched a new flagship store in Derry, offering beds, mattresses, and sofas. To celebrate the opening, they are running a Golden Ticket event with a chance to win a £500 voucher and other discounts. The Derry store also features Dreams' exclusive Sleepmatch technology to help customers find their perfect mattress.

articles.title: Neusoft Showcases at Japan IT Week Spring 2025  Apr. 25, 2025 14:51
articles.summary: Neusoft Corporation showcased its business offerings at Japan IT Week Spring 2025, including intelligent device solutions, enterprise digital transformation solutions, and in-vehicle integrated cockpit system development. The company launched Neusoft A3 Cockpit-Driving-Parking Platform, Neusoft NeuMind Empowerment System, and OneCoreGo® Global In-Vehicle Intelligent Mobility Solutions 6.0 to accelerate intelligent mobility for customers.

articles.title: Calling all citizen journalists! Sam Anthony – [your]NEWS
articles.author: your NEWS
articles.summary: yourNEWS operates as a hyper-local social news and advertising platform empowering citizen journalists. The article also includes promotional links for various products and services like wine (AlisonWinePromo.com), cod liver/butter oil (GreenPasture.org), coffee (TwinEngineCoffee.com), and indoor grow systems (EdenGrowSystems.com).

articles.title: Yango Group's Sergej Loiter on how AI is creating smarter experiences for communities, businesses and beyond
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: Yango introduced Yasmina, a bilingual AI assistant trained on Khaleeji content, and deployed autonomous delivery robots in Dubai with ROOTS. These robots, powered by AI, offer contactless deliveries within a two-kilometre radius in under 30 minutes, reducing emissions in line with Dubai's Autonomous Transportation Strategy.

articles.title: The Monolith
articles.author: W. F. Twyman
articles.summary: DAASH Robotics is advertising its DAASH Delivery XL robot, a non-humanoid delivery robot, which signals the introduction of a new product in the robotics market.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Launch Date Tipped; Check Details
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Samsung is anticipated to unveil the Galaxy S25 Edge at the Galaxy Unpacked event scheduled for May 13. The Galaxy S25 Edge is expected to launch in South Korea and China on May 23, followed by availability in the U.S. and other global markets starting May 30.

articles.title: My 'Glass Hair' Has Earned So Many Compliments — & This Mask Is Why
articles.author: Venus Wong
articles.summary: Fable & Mane introduced the Shine Hair Mask, a new intensive treatment claiming to inject luminosity and bounce into the hair. The mask features a blend of black tea ferments and moisture-boosting enzymes. The reviewer reported an immediately noticeable gloss to the hair after using the mask.

articles.title: Deals of the week: Aldi's Dyson Airwrap dupe, Arnotts home sale plus double Sculpted by Aimee points
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: Aldi launched the Ambiano 5-in-1 hairstyler as a budget-friendly alternative to the Dyson Airwrap, available in stores from May 1st. Laneige is offering the Plump & Hydrate Trio, featuring three hydrating skincare items, for €35.50. Dyson is currently offering €150 off the V11 Extra Cordless Vacuum Cleaner.

articles.title: Top gear
articles.summary: The article introduces the LIFELONG CAR SEAT MASSAGER, a new automotive gadget. This product blends luxury and technology to offer a smart and sleek in-car experience.

articles.title: Scouted: Molly Sims Celebrates Two Years of YSE Beauty With Two Powerhouse Drops
articles.summary: YSE Beauty is celebrating its two-year anniversary with the launch of two new products: Like a Gloss Hydrating Lip Tints, formulated with vitamin E, hyaluronic acid, and shea butter, and the Limited Edition Overachiever Brightening Eye Masks. Both products are designed to be multitasking and easy to use, providing maximum results with minimal effort.

articles.title: Ashok Leyland Expands Footprint in Telangana, Opens New LCV Dealership in Nizamabad
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Ashok Leyland has launched the Ashok Leyland SAATHI, a premium, entry-level small commercial vehicle powered by a 45 HP engine.  The company also offers other LCV products like BADA DOST, DOST XL, DOST+ XL, PARTNER, and MiTR, each catering to different payload and application needs with competitive ex-showroom pricing.

articles.title: Docker's new MCP Catalog, Toolkit to solve major developer challenges, experts say
articles.author: Info World
articles.summary: Docker is planning to introduce a new Model Context Protocol (MCP) Catalog and a Toolkit. These new products aim to solve major challenges faced by developers when building agentic applications.

articles.title: 35 Products With Such Impressive Results That Oops, You Might Get A Little Bit Of A God Complex Using Them
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights various new beauty and household products available on Amazon.  New products include Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream, The Pink Stuff's new Sqeezy sponge set, Lumify Eye Drops, Eos Cashmere Vanilla Cashmere Whipped Oil Body Butter, and Olay Super Serum Body Wash.  These products offer solutions for skin care, cleaning, and overall well-being, with user reviews attesting to their effectiveness.

articles.title: Types Of Moisturisers To Use For Oily Skin During Summers
articles.author: Amisha Shirgave
articles.summary: The content introduces several types of moisturizers suitable for oily skin during the summer. These include gel-based, oil-free, mattifying, non-comedogenic, and aloe vera-based moisturizers. Each type offers distinct benefits, such as quick absorption, shine control, or pore-clogging prevention, catering to specific needs of oily skin in hot weather.

articles.title: Samsung unveils Bespoke AI Kitchen Fit fridge with showcase door
articles.author: 바이트 Byte
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched the 'Bespoke AI Hybrid Kitchen Fit Max' refrigerator, which features a food showcase door for the first time in its Kitchen Fit lineup. This new model combines a Kitchen Fit Max design with a showcase-style door for easy access to frequently used ingredients.

articles.title: Looking for a budget-friendly student laptop? This one's on sale for $300
articles.author: Aaron Mamiit
articles.summary: Amazon offers the Nimo Young Book laptop for $300, a $140 discount from its original price of $440. This deal provides a 32% discount on the laptop. The offer is for a limited time.

articles.title: ‘Love these' shoppers cry as Primark drops new skincare dupes with £3.50 masks & £4 SPF to save hundreds on viral brand
articles.author: Josie O'Brien
articles.summary: Primark has launched a new skincare line featuring masks, moisturisers, and SPF products, with prices starting at £3.50. Products include the PS...Hydrating Whip Facial Moisturiser, PS...Dream Glow Face Mask, PS...Jelly Facial Cleanser, and various SPF options like the PS...Solar Shield Moisturiser with SPF 50. The launch was promoted on Instagram, with customers noting the resemblance to Bubble skincare products.

articles.title: ‘Love these' shoppers cry as Primark drops new skincare dupes with £3.50 masks & £4 SPF to save hundreds on viral brand
articles.author: Josie O'Brien
articles.summary: Primark has launched a new line of skincare products, including masks, moisturizers, and SPF buys, with some products being dupes for Bubble. Among the new products, there is the £3.50 PS...Hydrating Whip Facial Moisturiser, and the £3.50 PS...Dream Glow Face Mask, and new SPF products such as the £3.50 PS...Solar Shield Moisturiser with SPF 50.

articles.title: Primark's 'perfect' £23 floral dress looks 'stunning for summer'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor Money
articles.summary: Primark has launched the Sleeveless Corset Mini Dress priced at £23 and the Sleeveless Corset Midi Dress priced at £32. The dresses are available in various colors and sizes, featuring a corset-style bodice and are available for click and collect.

articles.title: Baidu offers new AI models with enhanced features, lower cost than DeepSeek's products
articles.author: Ben Jiang
articles.summary: Baidu launched Ernie 4.5 Turbo and X1 Turbo, two new artificial intelligence models. Ernie 4.5 Turbo costs approximately 40% less than DeepSeek's V3 large language model, while X1 Turbo is priced at a quarter of Hangzhou-based AI start-up's R1 reasoning model.

articles.title: Rest your head after the marathon with Simba's best-selling mattress
articles.author: Maisie Bovingdon
articles.summary: Simba's Hybrid Mattress features 1,900 Aerocoil micro springs, Simbatex foam technology, and a breathable case for support, airflow, and temperature regulation. It is available in single to super king sizes and comes with a 10-year warranty and recycling scheme. Simba also offers refurbished mattresses, Hybrid pillows, and the Ultra Hybrid Mattress.

articles.title: 'Gorgeous' £23 Primark dress 'looks just like designer brand'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor Money
articles.summary: Primark launched the Sleeveless Corset Mini Dress for £23 and the Sleeveless Corset Midi Dress for £32. The mini dress features a corset-style bodice, floral prints and is available in sizes 6 to 18, while the midi dress offers more coverage with a midi length and is available for click and collect.

articles.title: Aldi confirms return date of sell-out hair styler similar to Dyson for under £60
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Aldi is re-releasing its popular 5-in-1 Hair Styler for £59.99, a dupe for the Dyson AirWrap, along with a new Brushless Motor Hairdryer for £29.99 and other beauty products like a pore remover, manicure/pedicure sets, and a cordless epilator. These items will be available in the Specialbuys aisle starting May 1.

articles.title: Whatadeal Unveiled: SystemSpecs Re-launches Super Platform with New Leadership
articles.author: Bellanaija
articles.summary: SystemSpecs Holdings relaunched Deelaa as Whatadeal, signifying their commitment to reshaping African digital commerce. The unveiling of Whatadeal and the introduction of its new Managing Director took place at an event with media representatives and stakeholders.

articles.title: Microsoft Unveiled an AI-Generated Ad Without Anyone Realizing
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Microsoft utilized generative AI to produce a one-minute advertisement for its Surface Pro and Surface Laptop devices, which premiered on YouTube on January 30th. The AI tools were used to generate scripts, storyboards, and images, significantly reducing the time and cost of production, though the use of AI went largely unnoticed by viewers.

articles.title: Celebrating Progress & Partnerships: EZVIZ's New Product Launch in Sri Lanka
org: Advanced Digital Technology LRS Security Solution
articles.summary: EZVIZ launched its latest smart home products at the 'EZVIZ: LEADING SMART HOME EMPOWERMENT 2025' event in Sri Lanka. These new products aim to redefine security, connectivity, and convenience with advanced AI-driven technology and seamless smart home integration, solidifying EZVIZ's commitment to the Sri Lankan market and consumer lifestyles.

articles.title: Reviewers Over 40 Think These 36 Beauty Products Are Downright Amazing
articles.author: Taylor Steele
articles.summary: The article highlights a variety of newly launched or updated beauty products available on Amazon, including Olay body wash, snail mucin essence, collagen masks, facial scrub powder, eye creams, concealers, root cover-up spray, cleansing oil, mascara, lipstick, lip balm, anti-frizz spray, neck and chest cream, nail concealer, eyebrow gel, eyebrow pencil, facial toner pads, liquid exfoliant, lip liner, eyeliner stamp, sunscreen, body cream, hair protein treatment, teeth-whitening pens, curly hair custard, eyeshadow stick, blackhead remover, setting spray, setting powder, pore-shrinking primer, rice extract toner, retinol night cream, satin pillowcases, jelly lip mask scrub, powder blush, and face oil. Brands mentioned include Olay, K-Beauty, Dermalogica, LilyAna Naturals, L'Oreal, Essence, Maybelline, E.l.f, Color Wow, Gold Bond, Londontown, Medicube, Paula's Choice, Nyx, Elta MD, Sol de Janeiro, Elizavecca, MopTop, Milani, Tatcha and Eight Saints, many of which are introducing these products to cater to various skincare and beauty needs.

articles.title: Roll Cam AI calls itself the 'world's first robotic AI camera man' –and it's set to launch on Kickstarter soon
articles.author: Mike Harris
articles.summary: Roll Cam AI has launched its 'world's first robotic AI camera man' targeted at content creators and real estate agents. The device utilizes mobile auto-tracking AI, LiDAR, and CPU Vision Module for object recognition and tracking, and is compatible with DSLRs, mirrorless cameras, phones, and GoPros.  Roll Cam AI is offering VIP backer status for $1 reserving the Roll Cam AI and providing a 65% discount, pricing the robotic device at $199 if the crowdfunding campaign comes to fruition.

articles.title: Samsung, Brydens partnership expands ‘tech' reach across Guyana
articles.author: Shaniya Harding
articles.summary: Brydens Guyana Inc. has partnered with Samsung to make Samsung's latest product line available in Guyana through exclusive distribution. This partnership will improve access to top-tier technology for households and businesses, and is supported by robust services including free delivery, flexible credit facilities, and after-sales service with manufacturer warranties. The event included a product showcase of Samsung's newest releases.

articles.title: Motorola Introduces Moto Buds Loop: 45-Hour Battery Life, 12 mm Drivers, AI Features And More
articles.summary: Motorola is introducing the Moto Buds Loop, featuring 12mm drivers with Bose technology, spatial audio support, and AI-assisted noise reduction. The earbuds offer 'Smart Connect' for seamless device switching, up to 8 hours of playback on a single charge (37 hours with the charging case), and a water-repellent build. A luxury edition with Swarovski crystals will also be available.

articles.title: Next £35 linen top that 'levels up' summer outfits and 'can wear different ways'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Next has launched the Linen Blend Short Sleeve Ladder Insert Shirt, priced at £35. The top is available in black, neutral stone, and rust brown. It is a lightweight linen blend featuring 3/4 length sleeves and ladder panelling and is available on the Next website.

articles.title: Neusoft Showcases at Japan IT Week Spring 2025
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Neusoft Corporation showcased its products at Japan IT Week Spring 2025, focusing on solutions for digital transformation and intelligent mobility. The company launched new product portfolios including the Neusoft A3 Cockpit-Driving-Parking Platform, Neusoft NeuMind Empowerment System, and OneCoreGo® Global In-Vehicle Intelligent Mobility Solutions 6.0, designed for the Japanese and global markets.

articles.title: Wix just launched a tool that aims to take website personalization to the next level
articles.author: Sead Fadilpašić
articles.summary: Wix has launched Adaptive Content, a new AI-powered application for its website builder. This tool generates and modifies website content based on admin input and visitor characteristics, enabling personalized experiences such as localized content, currency, language and tailored messages for returning visitors.

articles.title: I got hands-on with the new Moto Razr Ultra, and I love that it brings back one unique phone feature I missed out on
articles.author: Philip Berne
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Motorola Razr Ultra 2025 on May 15, with pre-orders starting May 7. This high-end phone features unique materials like real wood and Italian Alcantara. The Motorola Razr 2025 will also launch with materials such as textured nylon-like finish and a silky Acetate.

articles.title: Your Nintendo Switch 2 pre-order might not arrive on release day, Nintendo warns
articles.author: Demi Williams
articles.summary: Nintendo has announced that pre-orders for the upcoming Switch 2, scheduled for release on June 5, 2025, may not arrive on the release date. The company cites "very high demand" as the reason for the potential delay in delivery.

articles.title: Just 30 Super Practical Walmart Products That Will Definitely Come In Handy As You Enter Adulthood
articles.author: Emily Shwake
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a range of new and notable products.  This includes the Pantene Pro-V Volume and Body Shampoo, praised for its deep-cleaning abilities, a dip powder nail kit for salon-quality manicures at home, and a microwave pasta cooker for convenient meal preparation.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro launching in India soon: 6.67 inch pOLED display, Dimensity 8350 SoC and everything expected
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: Motorola has launched its Edge 60 and Edge 60 Pro smartphones globally. The Edge 60 Pro, featuring a 6.67-inch display, triple camera setup and MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Extreme processor, is teased to arrive in India soon, with a dedicated product page live on Motorola's India website. It runs on Motorola's Hello UI based on Android 15 and includes a 6,000mAh battery with fast charging.

articles.title: Katrina Kaif's New Kay Beauty Jelly Lip and Cheek Wand Is As Juicy As A Popsicle
articles.author: Neel Achary
articles.summary: Kay Beauty, in collaboration with Nykaa, launched the Jelly Lip & Cheek Wand, a blush stick designed to provide a soft-focus, sun-kissed glow. The product, available in three shades, features a vegan, paraben-free, and silicone-free formulation infused with Ceramides and Peptides for hydration.

articles.title: Baidu launches new AI model amid mounting competition
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Baidu launched Ernie 4.5 Turbo, its latest artificial intelligence model. It also launched Ernie X1 Turbo, a new reasoning model.

articles.title: This nine-litre family-sized air fryer is just £50 thanks to a double discount
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a promotional deal on the Yashe dual air fryer, reducing the price to £49.99 with a voucher for Amazon Prime members. The Yashe air fryer features dual drawers, eight presets, smart sync, 3D circulation, and a digital display, and is comparable to the Ninja AF400UK.

articles.title: Branded merchandise can boost ROI and brand loyalty for Yorkshire companies
articles.author: Gift Campaign
articles.summary: Gift Campaign, a European company specializing in promotional merchandise, has expanded into the UK market. They offer a range of branded products, including tote bags, water bottles, and notebooks, providing businesses with tools for brand visibility and ROI. Gift Campaign focuses on businesses in Leeds, Sheffield, York and other regions.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 60, Edge 60 Pro with 50MP camera launched globally; India launch imminent
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Edge 60 series, featuring the Edge 60 and Edge 60 Pro smartphones. The Edge 60 Pro is expected to launch in India later this month and features a 6.7-inch display, a 50MP front camera, and a triple rear camera system and is powered by the Dimensity 8350 chipset. The Motorola Edge 60 is priced at £379.99, while the Edge 60 Pro starts at £599.99.

articles.title: China's Baidu upgrades Ernie AI models and slashes prices
articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.summary: Baidu Inc. introduced upgraded AI models Ernie 4.5 Turbo and Ernie X1 Turbo, which are faster and cheaper than previous versions, with the 4.5 Turbo priced 80% lower. The company also launched Xinxiang, an AI agent platform, to automate everyday tasks and added new servers for connecting AI models to its search-engine and e-commerce data.

articles.title: Motorola debuts $1,300 AI-infused Razr phone, Swarovski earbuds
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: Motorola, a Lenovo Group Ltd. brand, has launched a new Razr foldable phone lineup featuring AI assistants. The portfolio overhaul also includes the introduction of new earbuds and a watch.

articles.title: NGXLists Telecoms Company,LegendwithMarket CapitalisationofN12.4bn
articles.author: Thisday
articles.summary: Legon Internet Service Plc has been listed on the Nigerian Exchange Limited (NGX). It is the first company in its Telecoms sector and the first company to be listed.

articles.title: YouTube is testing a new AI Overviews carousel in its search results for queries focused on products and location information, for some US Premium subscribers (Danny Goodwin/Search Engine Land)
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: YouTube is testing a new AI Overviews carousel in its search results. This test focuses on queries about products and location information and is currently available to some US Premium subscribers. The new feature has the potential to reshape how users find videos.

articles.title: Motorola goes high fashion with new statement color foldable phones
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Motorola has launched a refreshed line of brightly-colored clamshell foldable phones. This represents a new product offering from the company.

articles.title: The State News Crossword, April 25, 2025
articles.summary: StateNews.com is launching a new version of its website. Users are invited to test drive the NEW StateNews.com website today.

articles.title: Why AI Agents Are Booming and the Real Challenges Behind the Hype
articles.summary: Amazon uses AI to proactively resolve customer issues, potentially offering refunds before complaints arise. Bank of America's virtual assistant Erica, integrated into their mobile app, assists customers with various banking tasks. Sephora utilizes an AI-powered chatbot to offer personalized makeup recommendations and streamline the customer experience, and HubSpot has embedded AI across its platform, from content optimization to automated lead nurturing.

articles.title: Space-saving Ninja air fryer that makes cooking 'quick and easy' £40 off
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg What's On
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Ninja Double Stack XL Air Fryer from £269.99 to £209.99. This Ninja air fryer features a space-saving design with a 9.5-litre capacity, two stacked drawers, and six cooking functions.

articles.title: 百度搜索開放平台·AI開放計劃發佈，李彥宏：早接入早獲益
articles.author: 新浪網
org: 星網宇達與一汽富維相繼公告與吉林省仿生機器人創新中心簽訂戰略合作協議。
articles.summary: Baidu launched its AI open platform during the Create Developers Conference. Realme officially launched its flagship product, Realme GT7, which is equipped with the latest 3nm flagship chip Dimensity 9400+.

articles.title: 35 Products On Amazon's "Internet Famous" List That Deserve Every Single Bit Of Their Hype
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights several recently launched or trending products. These include the Laneige's Neo Blurring Powder, E.l.f. Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm compared to Summer Fridays, Rhode, and Laneige, Dae's Hair Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand, Sol de Janeiro's Jet Set, a Glow Up! Vitamin C Face Serum, Monday Haircare Dry Shampoo, Clinique Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in PINK Honey, Lattafa Khamrah Eau de Parfum, EltaMD UV Clear Face Sunscreen, Neutrogena Dry-Touch SPF 70 Sunscreen, Jergens Natural Glow Firming Self Tanner Body Lotion, Bluey aqua art pad, Catrice \"Instant Awake\" Under Eye Brightener, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, Garnier Fructis Sleek & Shine Anti-Frizz Serum, Olay Super Serum Body Wash, E.l.f's Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, La Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser, Lego daffodils, E.l.f.'s Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops, Differin Acne Treatment Gel, Hanes slub knit hoodie, Pomade hair wax stick, Luxe pajama set,  and  Levi's Cinch Baggy Jeans, L'Oréal Paris Collagen Daily Face Moisturizer, adjustable sports bra, Racerback workout top, Sandproof mesh tote bag, Wide-leg yoga pants, E.l.f. Power Grip Dewy Setting Spray. It also highlights the instant foot peeling spray, gold-plated earrings, bracelets. Many of these are compared to more expensive versions.

articles.title: Sainsbury's follows Aldi and makes price change to over 800 products
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Sainsbury's has expanded its 'Aldi Price Match' initiative, introducing over 800 products price-matched to Aldi. The updated range includes items such as shower gel, hand wash, cotton wool, period products, cheese, and eggs.

articles.title: How to easily turn your LG Smart TV into an Xbox
articles.author: Frank Mueller
articles.summary: Microsoft announced that the Xbox App is now available on LG Smart TVs, allowing users to play Xbox games on their TVs without needing a separate Xbox console. This expansion requires compatible LG Smart TV models (2022 OLED TVs, select 2023 models, and newer) and an Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscription.

articles.title: AI Clones: Fast Fashion's Threat to Jobs, Identities
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: H&M introduced an "immersive dressing room" in its flagship store, offering a new shopping experience with virtual environments for creating social media content. Additionally, H&M utilized "digital twin" technology to create AI-generated replicas of 30 real-life models, sparking global interest and discussions about the ethical implications.

articles.title: Embrace the Sun: Your ultimate guide to a confident, fresh summer with Personal Collection
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Personal Collection (PC) promotes several products for summer, including Check Winter Fresh Moisturizing Antibacterial Soap which protects and hydrates, Check 72 Hours Antiperspirant Deodorant for all-day freshness, and Glutalight Ultimate Underarm and Bikini Area Whitening Cream to lighten dark spots. PC also features In The Mood Lipstick Limited Edition with VibeBoostTM formula and White Dove Ultra Sensitive Lotion for children's sensitive skin.

articles.title: NoScrubs: Interview With Co-Founder & CEO Matt O'Connor About The Laundry Delivery Service
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: NoScrubs offers a fast and affordable laundry delivery service, with turnaround times as fast as 2 hours. The company uses AI for quality control. After a successful launch in Austin, NoScrubs has expanded to Houston.

articles.title: Olam Agri Debuts With New Spaghetti Product In Nigeria
articles.author: Taiwo Hassan
articles.summary: Crown Flour Mill (CFM) Limited, a business of Olam Agri in Nigeria, has launched Crown Thick Spaghetti. The new product addresses the demand for thicker spaghetti strands and expands CFM's pasta portfolio, reinforcing its dedication to food security in Nigeria. Early feedback from consumer trials has been overwhelmingly positive.

articles.title: ‘How we're transforming Nigerian homes with style' — Baji Kitchens & Household Head of Product Devt
articles.author: Oboh
articles.summary: Baji Kitchens & Household introduces a new range of budget-friendly kitchen utensils, cookware, and household products to the Nigerian market. These products aim to provide stylish and functional solutions, enabling Nigerian families to create elegant living spaces and modern kitchens without exceeding their budgets. The company focuses on aesthetic appeal and affordability, setting new standards in the market.

articles.title: Aldi brings affordable grocery options to North Las Vegas
articles.author: Nicholas Sommer
articles.summary: Aldi has launched two new store locations in the Las Vegas area, one in North Las Vegas on Craig Road and another in Henderson on Marks Street. These new stores aim to provide affordable and fresh grocery options to the local community, with a focus on Aldi-exclusive brands.

articles.title: LG just launched a 32-inch 4K touchscreen monitor that has wheels and can even run ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: LG has unveiled the Smart Monitor Swing. The Smart Monitor Swing is a 31.5-inch 4K UHD touch-enabled display that comes on wheels and runs webOS.

articles.title: Simpleton Sugar: Sioux City firm launches easy-to-use system to make simple syrup
articles.author: Sioux City Journal
articles.summary: Simpleton Sugar is launching a new line of high-grade, easy-to-use, organic simple syrup products this month. The new line focuses on providing consumers with convenient and organic options.

articles.title: Proton's commitment to quality, innovation
articles.author: Amos Mpofu
articles.summary: Proton Bakers has introduced the Proton Rock Bun as a new product in response to market demand. The company has also recently enhanced its Hamburger Roll and Crusted Roll products. More new product offerings are planned to meet the evolving needs of the company's growing customer base.

articles.title: If You're On Team 'Get It Done As Fast As Possible,' You'll Love These 33 Efficient Products
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff launched the new "Sqeezy" sponge set for cleaning. Catrice introduced the "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, now in four shades, for concealing dark circles. Ninja launched the portable Crispi Air Fryer system, an all-in-one cooking and eating container.

articles.title: UAE expert warns of urgent need for reskilling as next-generation AI threatens to replace traditional jobs
articles.author: The National
articles.summary: Apple launched the iPhone 15 Pro Max, featuring an A17 Bionic chip and improved camera system, with pre-orders starting this Friday. Google announced AI feature updates to Google Docs and Sheets in its Workspace suite, rolling out to enterprise customers.

articles.title: Microsoft made an ad with generative AI and nobody noticed
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Microsoft created a minute-long advertisement for its Surface Pro and Surface Laptop hardware. The advertisement was made using generative AI. The company released the advertisement almost three months ago.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge launch may happen next month- All details
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge, an ultra-thin phone, is expected to launch soon. A new leak reveals a potential launch schedule following its initial appearance at the Galaxy Unpacked event in January and the MWC 2025.

articles.title: Switch 2 Edition upgrade packs will cost as much as $20
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching "Nintendo Switch 2 Edition upgrade packs" for the new hardware, enhancing older games with improved visuals and new features.

articles.title: Mobil unleashes new coolant line-up
articles.author: Jamaica Observer
articles.summary: Mobil launched a new coolant line-up. This indicates the introduction of a new product line by Mobil.

articles.title: 6 Reasons Why the Motorola Razr 2025 Series Could Be a Big Hit This Year
articles.author: Technowize Magazine
articles.summary: Motorola is unveiling the Motorola Razr 2025 series, featuring new flip phones. The series includes new colors and finishes. These phones will include a world's first triple 50MP camera system.

articles.title: OpenAI may integrate Shopify into ChatGPT: Report
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: ChatGPT now displays product suggestions directly from Shopify when users search for items. This integration replaces previous links to third-party websites with direct Shopify product information.
